summary: SPX fractal page frontend testing completed successfully. All core SPX functionality working correctly including price formatting, horizon switching, and data display.
passed_tests: Y-axis displays SPX points without $ symbols (shows 6,279, 6,489, 6,699, etc.)
Worst-case (5%) displays in correct 'pts' format (6,701 pts, 6,648 pts)
Forecast data changes with horizon switching (verified +2.4% to +1.1% change)
SPX price formatting uses 'pts' throughout the interface
RiskBox displays SPX risk metrics properly
Chart canvas renders correctly with SPX data
No error messages found on page
